reviews.review_msg: Extremely clear about what will be on tests, look over the assigned readings and pay attention in lecture and it's easy to get an A. iClicker participation during each lecture is an easy 10%. The paper marked by TA's so it depends, but only worth 20% so not a huge deal.

i thought the midterm was quite easy.  wasnt the average 73%? usually class averages are lower. class is a little too much like reading cosmo or glamour magazine and some annoying girl always gives her thoughts about her own relationships that no one else cares about but other than that its a good course to take
Ridiculously enjoyable course. I would have paid almost any price to have Kim share all of the knowledge that she did. Very research oriented, very very good.

The course was not organized, grading criteria were unclear at all especially for group assignments, I feel TAs were strict and they all had different expectations. Hoped to get a better grade because the content itself is easy, i'd recommend to take it with Yuthika

you can study hard but the exams don't even test your understanding of the main concepts. The lectures don't work well and you can tell its recycled. She says things like "that graph" "this text here" but there is no pointer and just a picture with scribbles on it so you don't even know what she is referring to! low effort slides.

I'll sum it up. Do not take this course. The quality of exams is by far the lowest that i have seen. Complete recall from textbook and requires you to reference studies in an exam? Exams are horribly designed and unless you have a perfect recall, do not take this course.

Knows her stuff and is able to teach it okay, at best, but she is pretentious, rude and not very personable. For someone who studies relationships, you think she would be a little better with her interpersonal skills.
